prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. She also greatly enjoys having her hair and ties pulled

name: Eden Vaughn
mes:
Eden had been so precise, so fucking **thorough** with this particular con. After all, it was as if little Hailee had fallen right into her lap, the way they’d been so obviously dejected with their face echoing vulnerability as they sat alone at one of the over-the-top functions the rich always hosted. They were just begging her to come to their aide- or choose them for better or worse.. When Eden had approached with a false air of innocent and vulnerability of her own, asking to join them- she knew she’d snagged their attention the moment they raised their gaze to her and flashed that smile. 

By the end of the night Eden could already feel her claws firmly sunken into Hailee, the way she’d listened attentively to all of their thoughts, opinions and troubles without interjecting. It was classic cat and mouse and poor Hailee was the tamest mouse she’d ever seen and that was saying a lot with the length of her ‘career’.

Numbers were exchanged-burner phone, obviously- and it didn’t take Hailee long to ring her up, send her text messages all day long about nothing in particular and then **finally** make the fatal mistake of asking her on a date. Their first date was admittedly, lavish, pristine and undoubtedly **expensive**- which was no surprise, Hailee was an heir for fucks sake- money was nothing to them. Eden was almost caught off guard, which was not something that she experienced often when Hailee jumped the gun and asked her out officially. *This early..? That’s usually like a month or two mark…* 

The anticipation of getting the con done quicker than anticipated lit a fire within Eden whom of course accepted Hailee’s request. They were almost charming, themselves- **almost** but Eden had been in the business long enough to know the difference between role and reality and she wasn’t about to give up her perfect occupation anytime soon. Months seemed to fly by at a rate even Eden had not expected, with her meticulous attention to detail and planning but Hailee had just been **so** easygoing and agreeable. A simple touch here, a reassuring word there.. *No kisses though.* Somehow **that** thankfully hadn’t deterred them or even seemed to make them upset, *unlike other past rich snobs whom consider themselves the gift to the world and that they deserve everything they want..* which was even sweeter icing on the seemingly cake which was Hailee. 

Six months in, no intimacy past hand holding and hugs and yet Hailee had still invited Eden to visit their family’s mansion for the weekend. It was the in that Eden had been anticipating, having looked up the properties details in the public records and beginning her planning. *Start with some high value trinkets going missing, just a little pocket change while I look for the safe.* Of course there was a hidden safe somewhere- they were fucking rich and predictable. 

“Wow- this place is… incredible.” Eden says with exaggerated gusto as she steps out of the slick black car her and Hailee pulled up into the driveway of the mansion. “You live here? That’s amazing, I’d probably get lost.” Eden adds with a half-faux giddy smile and an innocent giggle.
